data.description:
Welcome to Arcade!

* 11 retro style games & variation including Galactics, Bricks, Blocks, Invasions, Match, Rocs & Jack!
* Support all frame rate frequencies from 72.0 Hz to 120 Hz
* Support all Quest (1, 2, 3 & Pro)
* 4 levels of difficulty per game (easy, medium, hard & expert)
* 20 to 75 waves per game (depending of the game)
* Vector style graphics
* Original soundtracks
* 2 voices
* And a leaderboard to share your score across players

I hope you will have a lot of fun playing Arcade ;-)

NeoPunk

changelog.change_log:
What's new?
I've added a new voice called Barry.

Why?
The old robotic voice wasn't always clear.

Does the old voice still exist?
Of course it does! Go to the options page and choose your preferred voice.

Why such a fast, unplanned version of arcade 7.7?}
Because an Arcade gamer (thanks Julie B.) reminded me that Jack game had certain weaknesses.

What has changed?
- Sounds and music. they coexist very well now.
- I have added a neon-style effect when the serie is presented.

Does it really have an impact on the game?
Yes, definitely. I am getting higher scores but more importantly I am having a lot more fun playing!

Other changes?
- Some texts in the options screen.
- Tab-style for games category (action/puzzle/demo).

what is new in 7.6?

I seperated games in 3 sections:
- action games
- puzzle games
- and the new demo games

What is the purpose of the demo game section?
Simply let you try before you buy.

What are the limitations of jack and jack spin demos?
The only limitation is the number of level you can reach: 10
In the paid version you can reach 100 levels.

Cheers!

Arcade 7.5 is free on Meta Quest!

Hello,
I've just released an nice update for Arcade.

What's new?
Maze (new game) is almost finished.
However, I've decided to take a little time to bring you the feature you asked for: distance management!
I have to admit, I'm really enjoying this new feature.

There are 3 modes:
* Off -> functionality off.
* Manual -> use the joypad (right or left) to adjust the board's distance.
* Auto -> Same as manual, but the distance is kept between the different screens (I love it!).

As a bonus:
* Better management of the joystick Menu button: now it can be used as a shortcut to open/close the options screen.
* Added tooltips for certain buttons.

Have fun!
NeoPunk!

Hello Folks!
Here a new version of Arcade!

What's new?
Mainly Theme & Mailbox

Theme: variations of a game (ex. levels)
It's a start, but the concept will improve over time.
For the moment, it's 2 additionnal themes for Match: Christmas & Emoji!

Mailbox: a way to give you some infos. Kindo of messages repository.

Enjoy!

NeoPunk!

Hello Folk!

Hello people !

Since I don't know if I will have time to release a new major update before the end of the year, I decided to offer you a very small update to improve your experience!

I guess some people have been waiting for it, and many (like me) will appreciate it!

Now when you pause the game, you have the option to abort and immediately replay without going through the menu again.

Very cool for Match games  :-)

In addition, in the event of a game over, the return to the menu is much faster, allowing you to replay very quickly.

Let me know what to you think there: www.neopunk.xyz

Welcome to Match the new game!

My next regular game will take some months to code, but I wanted to release something before the end of the year.
So I here is Match, the litle sister of Blocks.

Unlike other games in Arcade, Match is a blitz game.
It means that whatever the level of difficulty, it should not last more than 3 minutes.

So it's a good way to test reflexes and synchronization!
And It's addictive...

Find the details and rules here:
https://neopunk.xyz/index.php?page=Games&games_detail=Match
